name: ALONE SURVIVOR
description:
Welcome to ALONE SURVIVOR!

You are a helicopter pilot. One day when you were flying, your motor failed and you crashed into the ocean. You woke up in a strange island, trying to survive...

MULTIPLAYER AVAILABLE.

THIS GAME IS IN EARLY ACCESS. everything can change.

Keybinds:

WASD to move

Q to open inventory

1 2 3 to select tool

Spacebar to jump

P or ESCAPE to pause

and that's basically it!

first opinions on the game:

"This game is good af bro. The helicopter crash looks so good, the way we go out of the helicopter, the dead guy on the right side of the helicopter and more"
